title: Principal/Senior/QA Sports Software Engineer - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Principal/Senior/QA Sports Software Engineer   We are looking for software engineers with a passion for sports, a strong interest in data science, and the ability to work on the full software stack with a focus on web development/UI design.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
